nodes.text: Lorul was a female Nautolan Private of the Galactic Republic living during the Galactic War. During the Invasion of Belsavis around 3641 BBY she was stationed in the High Security Section on Belsavis when the Empire provoken poisonous local fauna into attacking Republic forces. Sergeant Kayen developed an antidote against the poison, which required the gland samples from the creatures to work, and asked a Republic operative in the area to gather the glands and deliver them to Private Lorul.
Private Lorul appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic as an NPC on Belsavis, who starts the mission "Emergent Medicine."
